name: Jewel Quest Solitaire Trio
synopsis: Triple The Solitaire Fun! Love Solitaire? Jewel Quest: Solitaire Trio brings together Jewel Quest Solitaire I, Jewel Quest Solitaire II and Jewel Quest Solitaire III all into one package! Enjoy Tri-peaks, Nester and Klondike with Jewel Quest jewel board mini games in between!
